response.value:
Introduction:

﻿﻿The aim of this report is to most popular mean of transportation is train or bike but they have some advantage or disadvantage. from my point of view train is the most popular mean of transportation.

Most popular mean of transportation:

﻿Now a days everyone have a bike its common thing and is easy to travel anywhere.it cover large distance in short time. we are discuss some advantage of bike. it need less repair and maintenance or fuel. it consume less space for parking. riding a bike can boost your mood ,decrease in anxiety less your quality of sleep improves. it builds muscles and keeps your lung healthy. now we discuss some disadvantage. there is risk of personal safety driver of bike don't have doors, air bags or bumper to protect them from impacts with property and other vehicles. bike is slow as compare to train. after the ride we should have change our clothes because of dust piratical


Second most popular mean of transportation:

﻿the train transport is better organized then another form of transport. it has fixed routs and schedules its services is more certain, uniform and regular as compare to other mode of transport. its greater advantages is that its is most dependable mode of transport and is the least affected by weather condition such as rain and fog. now we discuss disadvantage is having expensive ticket in rush hours. some time train are late due to some problem in engine or other rescheduled due to weather some administration problems. train and station can be very busy places this can make a journey very uncomfortable due to crowded conditions


Recommendations:

﻿in Train peoples have to manage your time to avoided the late in your lessons

in institute should have changing room for student to change their clothes after ride

data.stimulus:
You are going to write a report for your University.

You should…

  • Write about the TWO most popular means of transportation used by students
  • Discuss the advantages AND disadvantages
  • Make some recommendations to the university
 

Analyse the information in the table below:

 

Write your report using the ALL the information in the table.

Write COMPLETE sentences. Do NOT use bullet points.

Use at least ONE of your own ideas in the recommendations section.

 

Follow the report structure you can see below:

 

 

Write your report in the box below. Start with: 

The aim of this report is to ...
